fields.title: Complete Python Bootcamp
fields.short_description: Learn Python from scratch to expert!
fields.description: Master Python by building 100 projects in 100 days. This comprehensive course covers fundamentals, OOP, web scraping, automation, data analysis and more.

fields.title: React for Beginners
fields.short_description: Start building modern UIs with React.
fields.description: Learn React from scratch. Covers components, hooks, state management, context API, and building real-world applications.

fields.title: Machine Learning A-Z
fields.short_description: Hands-on Python & R In Data Science.
fields.description: Learn to create Machine Learning Algorithms in Python and R. Covers regression, classification, clustering, deep learning and more.

fields.title: Django Web Framework Masterclass
fields.short_description: Build powerful web applications with Django.
fields.description: Complete guide to Django - from basics to deployment. Learn models, views, templates, REST APIs, authentication, and deployment to production.

fields.title: Docker & Kubernetes Complete Guide
fields.description: Learn Docker containers, Docker Compose, Kubernetes pods, deployments, services, and production-ready DevOps practices.

fields.title: SQL & PostgreSQL Complete Course
fields.description: Learn SQL from basics to advanced. Covers queries, joins, indexes, stored procedures, and PostgreSQL-specific features.

fields.title: Vue.js 3 Complete Guide
fields.description: Master Vue.js 3 from basics to advanced. Learn Composition API, Vuex/Pinia, Vue Router, and build production-ready applications.

fields.title: TypeScript Fundamentals
fields.description: Master TypeScript from basics to advanced. Learn types, interfaces, generics, decorators, and integrate with React/Vue.

fields.title: React Native Mobile Development
fields.short_description: Build iOS and Android apps with React Native.
fields.description: Create cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. Learn navigation, native modules, state management, and app store deployment.
